#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#define ll long long 
using namespace std;
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	ll opening=0,j,max=0,i,len;
	char str[100000];
	//scanf("%[^\n]s",str);
	fgets(str, sizeof(str), stdin);

	len= strlen(str);
	
	for ( i = 0; str[i]; ++i)
	{
		if(str[i]=='(')
			opening++;
		else if(str[i]==')')
			opening--;

		if(opening > max)
			max = opening;
	}
	
	//printf("%lld\n", max);
	ll new_opening =0;
	
	for ( i = 0; i < len; ++i)
	{
		if(str[i]=='(')
			new_opening++;
		else if(str[i]==')')
			new_opening--;
		if(new_opening == max)
		{
			for(j=i+1 ; str[j]!=')' ; j++)
			{
				printf("%c", str[j]);
			}
			break;
		}
	}
	
	printf("\n");
	return 0;
}
